title: Stakefast
author: Stakefast
created_time: October 29, 2023, 01:05:03 AMLast edit: February 02, 2025, 08:51:24 PM by Stakefast
content: CRYPTO WEBSITE DIRECTORYI'M FILLING THIS WEBSITE DAILY, I WILL KEEP YOU UPDATEDLET ME KNOW OF ANY SITES TO ADD

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: @StakefastI didn't expect to see another crypto directory "from you" and since I prefer using the other one over this, I'm wondering if you're planning to halt Bitpr0's operations in order to focus on this one instead.

comments.author: Stakefast
comments.body: Quote from: SFR10 on November 01, 2023, 09:33:41 AM@StakefastI didn't expect to see another crypto directory "from you" and since I prefer using the other one over this, I'm wondering if you're planning to halt Bitpr0's operations in order to focus on this one instead.Hey thanks for your comment.I am still updating bitpr0, but butpr0 its a multiple people project. As only 2/3 of people only work for it anymore, I choosed to create a new directory for myself which I will work more on it.Also Blockxs lists websites that bitpr0 doesnt have a category for.

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: Great project you working on @Stakefast, just bookmarked this to my crypto folder  Just a quick one, I see you have added X to the socials category is that suppose to be there.. and secondly if Bitcointalk is here, could you add Altcointalk>>>>> https://www.altcoinstalks.com/index.php being a crypto site(Altcoin dedicated)

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: Looks great. Bookmarked. Would it be possible for you to add just a little info about the website when we hover over it? It would be a helpful feature for those who are not familiar with those sites.Also enlarge the scroll bar a bit 'cause, at first glance, I personally didn't notice it and that there are more websites within each category.

comments.author: Stakefast
comments.body: Quote from: Woodie on November 05, 2023, 05:45:54 PMGreat project you working on @Stakefast, just bookmarked this to my crypto folder  Just a quick one, I see you have added X to the socials category is that suppose to be there.. and secondly if Bitcointalk is here, could you add Altcointalk>>>>> https://www.altcoinstalks.com/index.php being a crypto site(Altcoin dedicated)Thank you so much   yes its intentionally on socials, since its a social media platform.Quote from: julerz12 on November 06, 2023, 02:23:31 AMLooks great. Bookmarked. Would it be possible for you to add just a little info about the website when we hover over it? It would be a helpful feature for those who are not familiar with those sites.Also enlarge the scroll bar a bit 'cause, at first glance, I personally didn't notice it and that there are more websites within each category.  Thats a great recommendation, I will try to update the website the next few months and add this, maybe if you hover over a site it will be flipping like a block and shows you some basic info

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Hey there Stakefast! This site seems pretty interesting.  I am definitely going to keep an eye on how it develops going forward.  The one thing I am not totally crazy about though is how all the links initially point to your own tracking url before redirecting me to the actual site and  I get why you set it up like that, but I just dont love it since I cannot see the real url when I hover over the links.  Makes me wonder if there might be another way for you to keep track of clicks that does not hide the true destination url from us.  By the way, I noticed a small mistake: It should be "BOT.SEUNTJIE", not "BOTSETUNJIE".Anyway, cool idea overall! Ill be curious to see where you take this.

comments.author: Stakefast
comments.body: We just added LUCKYBIRD in our gambling section.

comments.body: Quote from: Stalker22 on November 07, 2023, 09:12:37 PMHey there Stakefa......It's interesting that you noticed this because I also thought about it as soon as I entered the website.I think it wouldn't hurt to make a button that opens the project in detail and gives you the opportunity to view links if necessary, it's not that difficult, just an example. (~Check on photo)

(~Check on photo)Wow, thats a really cool idea. I will probably do it this way, keep you tuned

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: You have a column for cryptocurrency wallets but there are very little wallets on your website.May you consider to add more wallets?I also recommend to break down wallets from some different types like- Bitcoin wallets- Altcoin wallets with smart contract interactionsWith Bitcoin wallets, break them down to open source, non custodial vs close source, custodial wallets.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Good work Stakefast. May I suggest to add Casino Critique? It's a gambling platform review site and we are slowly progressing our work.It looks like a hobby project but I hope soon you will find a good response and can make the hobby to a passion.Good luck!

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: Stakefast on January 13, 2024, 12:19:01 PMAdded a few more categoriesLast time I checked, Bitcointalk wasn't under the "browser games" category [there might be some conflicting elements in the code].A light/dark switch button would also be nice.

comments.author: Stakefast
comments.body: Quote from: SFR10 on January 13, 2024, 02:08:13 PMQuote from: Stakefast on January 13, 2024, 12:19:01 PMAdded a few more categoriesLast time I checked, Bitcointalk wasn't under the "browser games" category [there might be some conflicting elements in the code].A light/dark switch button would also be nice.Thanks for the hint, it was a mistake on my side, moved it to socials Dark/White switch sounds like a great idea, I will implement it.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Quote from: Stakefast on January 14, 2024, 08:49:56 AMThanks for the hint, it was a mistake on my side, moved it to socials Dark/White switch sounds like a great idea, I will implement it.What do you think about adding BitMixList in one of the categories?

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: I think you can improve on your wallet list. Firstly, it mentions only a few software and browser-based wallets. There isn't one hardware wallet there. Perhaps you can take some names from https://thebitcoinhole.com/software-wallets when it comes to software wallets. It's a website created and maintained by another user of Bitcointalk. I also feel like the wallet category, being as important as it is, should be much higher up on your website and not something placed in the end.

comments.author: BayAreaCoins
comments.body: AltQuick.com and FreeBitcoins.comThey both share the same affiliate system/code as well and are useful websites.
